A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible script\, plot wholes everywhere\, characters are a mess\, story arcs that go nowhere. Yet because there was a few good gags and action scenes the critics love it?! Now I loved some of Rian Johnson's other movies\, but this was just a badly written script on so many levels. It's not bold or creative to have a plot that doesn't make sense and characters that go nowhere and act illogically. I guess most critics are just journalist grads that have never worked on a film or book\, or know anything about the fundamentals of story-telling.
